effect_entries.effect: Raises the user's Speed by two stages.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises the user's Speed by two stages.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
The user polishes its
body to reduce drag.
It can sharply raise
the Speed stat.

The user polishes its
body to reduce drag.
It can sharply raise
the Speed stat.

The user polishes its
body to reduce drag.
It can sharply raise
the Speed stat.

Le lanceur polit son corps pour
diminuer sa résistance au vent.
Augmente fortement la Vitesse.

The user polishes its body to reduce drag.
It can sharply raise the Speed stat.

The user polishes its body to reduce drag.
It can sharply raise the Speed stat.

じぶんの　からだを　みがいて　くうきの
ていこうを　すくなくする。すばやさを
ぐーんと　あげることが　できる。

자신의 몸을 갈아 공기의
저항을 적게 한다. 스피드를
크게 올릴 수 있다.

Le lanceur polit son corps pour diminuer sa
résistance au vent. Augmente fortement la Vitesse.

Anwender reduziert so gut wie möglich den
Luftwiderstand. Kann Initiative-Wert stark steigern.

Reduce la resistencia puliendo su cuerpo. Aumenta
la Velocidad considerablemente.

Chi la usa leviga il proprio corpo per ridurne
l’attrito. Aumenta di molto la Velocità.

The user polishes its body to reduce drag.
This can sharply raise the Speed stat.

自分の　体を　磨いて　空気の
抵抗を　少なくする。素早さを
ぐーんと　あげることが　できる。
